K12D0704_H0673:47a-0: @47a na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12D0704_H0673:47a-1: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12D0704_H0673:47a-4: ma h'a ka ru ni k'a ya /
K12D0704_H0673:47a-13: bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar pa'i lci ba sa
K12D0704_H0673:47a-14: la ma ltung bas so sor mandala brgyad byas la
K12D0704_H0673:47a-15: mandala re re la lan bcu gsum gyi bar du
K12D0704_H0673:47a-16: bzlas la / lci ba lhag ma la sngags bzlas te sman pa la nye bar byugs na /
K12D0704_H0673:47a-17: nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0704_H0673:47a-18: gal te nyi ma bdun nam /
K12D0704_H0673:47a-20: nyi shu rtsa gcig gis 'grub ste /
K12D0704_H0673:47a-22: mtshams med pa lnga byas pa ni /
K12D0704_H0673:47a-25: bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro //
K12D0704_H0673:47a-27: rgya gar gyi mkhan po ngag gi dbang phyug dang /
